author: mininny
content: Is xatu not expected to work with fulu yet? I see that it uses https://github.com/attestantio/go-eth2-client which follows the beacon API. Since fulu changes aren't made yet, xatu won't work properly, right?

author: mininny
content: I was working on this over the weekend: https://github.com/testinprod-io/Peeroor and got it to roughly work. But I figured we could just easily set the nodes as staticpeers in CLI command...(one benefit would be peering without restarting the nodes) Would love to know if you think this would be worth finalizing for actual usage?
